summary: Have you ever joined the Companions and wished they looked a little better? Do you think that Vilkas and Farkas should look good?  Well I did, so I decided to create this mod.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FAFAD2][center][size=6][b]Have you ever joined the Companions and wished they looked a little better? Do you think that Vilkas and Farkas should look good?  Well I did, so I decided to create this mod.[/b][/size][/center][/color]
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/48165848/companions%20thread%20copy.jpg[/img][/center]
I made this mod for myself to use in my Let\'s play series. I though it would be cool if the Companions looked a little better. I don\'t consider myself a modder and I actually know very little about modding. I am sharing this mod if ever there\'s other people out there that want to enjoy it.

[youtube]pdrGhR9cudc[/youtube]

Do understand that this is not a stand alone mod and you will need some mods to make them look like they do in the pictures.

[color=#00BFFF][size=5][b][u]Mods Needed![/u][/b][/size][/color]
Please know that if you do not install these two mods before the Companions Makeover in your load order you will get a CTD!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_1[/url]


Both can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?

[color=red][size=4][b]Note: The ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full will not work![/b][/size][/color]


[color=#00BFFF][size=5][b][u]If you want them to look like the pictures here\'s the mods that I used.[/u][/b][/size][/color]


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141/?]High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25211/?]TairenSoul Female Face Tattoo Warpaint - TS Female Face Tattoos V3 - HI RES[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25791/?]TairenSoul Male Face Tattoo Warpaint - TS Male Face Tattoos V3 - HI RES[/url]


[color=red][size=4][b]If you want to see them in action watch my Let\'s play series[/b][/size][/color]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_hRKS5SUIMdRiLqN0EY3I3rtgehgY7Cd]Let\'s Play Skyrim Modded[/url]
author: LadyLexyxox
